name: Leaf Jam
description:
You play as a bored kid whose been told to blow the leaves out of your garden. Instead of making them into piles so you can bag them up however, you decide that it'd be easier just to blow everything into your neighbour's gardens!

Compete for the high score by blowing leaves into every garden that isn't yours. Bonus points for matching colours, minus points for returned leaves!

Credits:

Lead Programmer - Dan Ryan

Lead Artist - Joanna Arszynska

Background/UI Artist - Semra Usanmaz

Character Artist - Tyreese Pitter

Sound Effects/Game Music - George Ricci

Sound Effects - Malcolm Sanchez

Menu Music - Asher Nelson-Philips

Game Designer - Toni Popov

Game Designer - Micah Brogan
